quoted.text: I'm not joking and this isn't funny. We have been trying to build distributed agent orchestrators at Google since last year. There are various options, not everyone is aligned... I gave Claude Code a description of the problem, it generated what we built last year in an hour.

user.name: Jaana Dogan ãƒ¤ãƒŠ ãƒ‰ã‚¬ãƒ³
user.description: Principal Engineer at Google. Gemini API. Simplicity and optimism. Personal opinions.

quoted.text:
To cut through the noise on this topic, itâ€™s helpful to provide more more context:

- We have built several versions of this system last year. - There are tradeoffs and there hasn't been a clear winner.
- When prompted with the best ideas that survived, coding agents are able to go very far and generate a good decent toy version in an hour or so.
